channel.title: hamishmr on 2021 Design Refresh
channel.description: Recent content in hamishmr on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: fruit that isn't fruit
item.description: Week 17: The 4 R’s: Finale. This art was lovingly created using: keeb. Artist’s Notes shutuphamish (twitch) for a while i didn’t have an idea for the final refresh, but i knew i wanted to enter. i missed (a lot) more showcases than i wanted to at the start and only entered twice before this (and really only one good entry) but i’ve been here the whole time, watching vods and enjoying the submissions!

item.title: beach ðŸ™‚
item.description: Week 4: Murky Silhouettes. This art was lovingly created using: Photo and Adobe Suite. Artist’s Notes this image was captured a few years ago on the southwest coast, at sunset as the sky cleared after a storm. it was already near monochrome, but i dropped the exposure to play with the value a bit edit: this came out a bit dim in discord yikes nah ðŸ™‚ Social Media N/A.
